user_comment: This feed allows you to read the posts from this site in any feed reader that supports the JSON Feed format. To add this feed to your reader, copy the following URL — https://floatingatoll.github.io/attribution/feed.json — and add it your reader.
title: Attribution Required

items.content_html: On February 16, 2015, I sat down with Craft just outside of Ithaca, N.Y., and asked him about his recollections of Arecibo, the data visualizations in his thesis and the Unknown Pleasures album cover.
I have never met an automaton that literally could not, though I have met some that theoretically would not and hypothetically might want to stop.
